channel.title: Gbif regions on GBIF Data Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Gbif regions on GBIF Data Blog

item.title: GBIF Regional Statistics - 2020
item.description: jpg | pdf | svg | code Iceland Index. A plot of raw species counts from equal-area hexagons approximately the size of Iceland. This plot excludes international waters, but includes countries EEZ areas. We see here that while Iceland has >5K species other areas within Amazonia, Eastern Europe, and Africa have suspiciously fewer, indicating a likely data gap. What are the GBIF regions? jpg | pdf | svg | code
